item.description: Node 20 cannot bind port less than 1024 without root permission # The same code to listen on 0.0.0.0:443 works well on Node 18, but got an error on Node 20: "Error: listen EACCES: permission denied 0.0.0.0:1023 at Http2SecureServer.setupListenHandle [as _listen2] (node:net:1880:21) at listenInCluster (node:net:1945:12) at doListen (node:net:2109:7) at process.processTicksAndRejections (node:internal/process/task_queues:83:21)", "code":"EACCES", "errno":-13, "syscall":"listen", "address":"0.0.0.0", "port":1023}, "msg":"listen EACCES: permission denied 0.0.0.0:1023" So I tried to listen on port 1023 and 1024, and the project can listen well on 1024 but not 1023.
